foods.name: Arepa
foods.description: A traditional Venezuelan cornmeal bread that is often stuffed with various fillings.

foods.name: Cachapa
foods.description: A sweet corn pancake made with fresh corn kernels and typically filled with cheese.

foods.name: Empanada
foods.description: A savory pastry filled with a variety of ingredients such as meat, cheese, or vegetables.

foods.name: Desayuno Criollo
foods.description: A traditional Venezuelan breakfast consisting of various components like eggs, cheese, arepas, and more.

foods.name: Pabellon
foods.description: Venezuela's national dish, consisting of shredded beef, black beans, rice, and fried plantains.

foods.name: Hallaca
foods.description: A traditional Venezuelan dish made of corn dough stuffed with a flavorful mixture of meat, olives, and raisins.
